titleStmt.title: A brief exposition of the prophecies of Obadiah, Jonah, Micah, Nahum, Habakkuk and Zephaniah. By George Hutcheson minister at Edenburgh. Imprimatur, Edm. Calamy
titleStmt.author: Hutcheson, George, 1615-1674.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition with amendments by the author.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ralph Smith, at the Bible in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Bible in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange
